attributes.name: Right lower extremity length
attributes.description: Total length of the right lower extremity measured from the apex of the right femoral head to the center of the right tibial plafond

attributes.name: Right femur length
attributes.description: Length of the right femur measured from the apex of the right femoral head to the distal medial right femoral condyle

attributes.name: Right tibia length
attributes.description: Length of the right tibia measured from the medial right femoral condyle to the center of the right tibial plafond

attributes.name: Left femur length
attributes.description: Length of the left femur measured from the apex of the left femoral head to the distal medial left femoral condyle

attributes.name: Left tibia length
attributes.description: Length of the left tibia measured from the medial left femoral condyle to the center of the left tibial plafond

attributes.name: Right lower extremity angle at the knee
attributes.description: The angle between the right femur and tibia

attributes.name: Left lower extremity angle at the knee
attributes.description: The angle between the left femur and tibia

attributes.name: Pelvic Tilt
attributes.description: Angle between the iliac crest to the horizontal

attributes.name: Leg Length Discrepancy
attributes.description: Absolute value of the difference between the lengths of the right and left lower extremities

attributes.name: Leg length discrepancy side
attributes.description: The side of the leg that is longer
